00060 void RawEthernetPacket::Serialize(const int fd) const
00061 {
00062   if (writeall(fd,(char*)&size,sizeof(size))!=sizeof(size)) {
00063     throw SerializationException();
00064   }
00065   if (writeall(fd,data,size)!=(int)size) {
00066     throw SerializationException();
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void RawEthernetPacket::Unserialize(const int fd)
00071 {
00072   if (readall(fd,(char*)&size,sizeof(size))!=sizeof(size)) {
00073     throw SerializationException();
00074   }
00075   if (readall(fd,data,size)!=(int)size) {
00076     throw SerializationException();
00077   }
00078 }

00083 void RawEthernetPacket::Print(unsigned size, FILE *out) const
00084 {
00085   fprintf(out,"raw_ethernet_packet: size %-4u first %u bytes: ", this->size, MIN_MACRO(this->size,size));
00086   printhexbuffer(out,data,MIN_MACRO(this->size,size));
00087   fprintf(out,"\n");
00088 }

00090 std::ostream & RawEthernetPacket::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00091 {
00092   char buf[10240];
00093   unsigned n;
00094   unsigned i;
00095 
00096   snprintf(buf,2048,"RawEthernetPacket(size=%u, bytes=", size);
00097   n=strlen(buf);
00098   for (i=0;i<size;i++) {
00099     bytetohexbyte(data[i],&(buf[n+2*i]));
00100   }
00101   buf[n+2*i]=0;
00102   os<<(char*)buf;
00103   os<<", text=\"";
00104   for (i=0;i<size;i++) {
00105     char c=data[i];
00106     if (c>=32 && c<=126) {
00107       os<<c;
00108     } else {
00109       os<<'.';
00110     }
00111   }
00112   os << "\")";
00113 
00114   return os;
00115 }
